page.title: 14YOUTH CLUB PRINCESS RISBOR,
page.content: The Youth club is situated on the site of the secondary School. It is open to a young Adult, between the ages of 14 and 18, in Risborough and the surrounding Villages. The Youth club run various different actvities and trips. One of the most popular actities is Rollar skating which is held in the community Centre every Sunday morning. The session commences at 10-30am and finishes at 12-45pm. At about 11-30am the members play some games such as bulldog, racing, musical chairs and limbo, all of which are played on the Rollar skatches. The Youth club also arranges trips for the members such as canoeing weekends, weekly trips to a lake for lessons in windsurfing, Rollar skating at nearby Villages, Swimming and ice skating. Visits to big amusement parks.
